Metadata.Title: Ask the User for Confirmation for Sensitive Operations
Metadata.DirectLink: Ask the User for Confirmation for Sensitive Operations

Content.Data:
What to Do

When the user performs a dangerous operation, send a separate confirmation request to ensure that the user intended to perform that operation.

Note: Note that this can be bypassed using XSS (CWE-79).

Additional Resources

  • For more information about "CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')", please see http://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/79.html
